SustainabilityStakeholder.name: SustainabilityStakeholder
SustainabilityStakeholder.description: Represents the stakeholder for sustainability data, such as stakeholder for environmental, social, and governance data.

ContactId.description: The contact or user associated with the stakeholder.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record. If this value is null, this record might only have been referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

OwnerId.description: The ID of the user who owns this record.

ReferenceObjectId.description: The environmental, social, and governance object associated with this stakeholder.

Role.description: The role of the stakeholder; for example, data collector for electricity, waste, or water.

RoleDescription.description: The description of the stakeholder's role.
